page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The Aslockton , Whatton and Scarrington area is not a poor area but it is not a rich area. Most people work at jobs like teaching or office work. Alot of people work at the detention centre as teachers or as prison officers. Many people work in Nottingham and they travel every day on the train to work. They are called commuters. Other people work in and around the villages at different things. Some work on the farms, some work in the village shops. Many people have their own businesses like plumbing or electricians. When the teenagers leave the nearby coprehensive school very few of them find jobs near home. They either get jobs in Nottingham, Newark or Grantham some get jobs in Bingham, which is only afew miles away.
